text:
Hi Tibebe, I hope you had a nice long weekend, not that it makes a difference with us all having to stay at home anyway! 

That sounds cool! Having now discovered a passion for VFX, what roles do you think you are more interested in and have you started using any softwares to create your own effects? 

Your film course sounds really interesting. Do you get to do some practical modules with that or is it mainly theory based?

It’s not plain at all! That is how a lot of people start out and you’re still really young so you’ve got a lot to learn!

Im very interested in the editing part but i also enjoy filming.  
My computer cant handle that much so ive only made basic stuff
In our film class till now its mostly been recreating scenes from famous movies and analysing those scene
But we also have some theory lessons where we get to learn about film movements and other stuff
